tika-s0404t2:2_3: So hi rājapurisānaṁ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṁ,
tika-s0404t2:2_5: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṁ hatthaṁ gatattā nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti jāto.
tika-s0404t2:2_6: Tenāha ‘‘āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro’’ti. Catutthādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0404t2:5_1: Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya suppaṭividdhā,
tika-s0404t2:5_2: vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapīti dassento āha ‘‘sahavipassanāya maggapaññāyā’’ti. Ime kāmāti dvepi kāme vadati.
tika-s0404t2:5_3: Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti ‘‘aṅgārakāsūpamā’’ti vuttā.
tika-s0404t2:5_5: byantaṁ vigatantaṁ bhūtanti byantibhūtanti āha ‘‘vigatantabhūta’’nti, nittaṇhanti attho.
tika-s0404t2:8_1: Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṁ āvāhaṁ gacchanti, vivāhaṁ na gacchanti,
tika-s0404t2:8_3: Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṁ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
tika-s0404t2:11_8: Santaguṇaniguhanenāti attani saṁvijjamānānaṁ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena.
tika-s0404t2:11_10: No mahicchassāti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato.
tika-s0404t2:12_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṁ samodhānaṁ saṅgaṇikā,
tika-s0404t2:12_1: sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa.
tika-s0404t2:12_4: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena ‘‘ayaṁ dhammo’’ti vacanato. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-s0404t2:12_5: Vivaṭṭanissitaṁyeva hi samādhānaṁ idhādhippetaṁ, tathā paññāpi.
tika-s0404t2:12_6: Kammassa-katapaññāya hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṁ ñāṇaṁ abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṁ karoti.
tika-s0404t2:12_7: Mānādayo sattasantānaṁ saṁsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcāti āha ‘‘taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā’’tiādi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
